Package javelin.model.world.location.dungeon.feature

Class Throne

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.location.dungeon.feature.Feature
      • javelin.model.world.location.dungeon.feature.Throne
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Throne
extends Feature
    Grants a TemporarySpell to any unit sitting in it, once every 24 hours. TODO may want to extract a common superclass MagicDevice with Mirror (and make mirror activatable once every 24h).
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • filterspells

        public static java.util.List<Spell> filterspells​(int level)
        Returns:
        Given a Combatant level or Dungeon level, return a list of combat spells that are relevant. May be empty if cannot find any, so decrementing the level until a valid result is given is advised.
        See Also:
        Monster.cr, Spell.castinbattle

        Description copied from class: Feature
        Called when a Squad reaches this location.
        Specified by:
        activate in class Feature
        Returns:
        true if the Squad activates this feature or false if it is ignored.
